title: Sins of a Solar Empire 1.02 Mega Trainer
description:
This is the trainer that the assholes over at cheathappens.com want to charge people an access fee to get.
I simply could not believe people were attempting to profit over the creation of game cheats - which many groups have brought to us freely in the past.
I even turned a blind eye to what these people were doing UNTIL i saw a &#039;promo trainer&#039; for this game that they had sent to gamecopyworld.

Perhaps the people at cheathappens feels they should be compensated for the time spent making these trainers. Perhaps I would agree if they actually developed their own trainer engine instead of using a readily available one.

As someone who used to also make trainers and bring them freely to the public I am right pissed off that now I dont have time to make those - someone else does and charges people for them. 
And no eventually releasing them to the public for free does not cut it. You are taking advantage of people who want those cheats now.

So here is their trainer in full with watermarks removed
